author: aclute
msg: Handle exceptions a little bit more gracefully, as we don't want to kill the entire stack

author: tomdz
msg: Fix for bug uncovered by OJB-61 where the unqualified name was used instead of the qualified name for retreiving a class for checking the assignability of the class-ref type and the declared variable type

Added check for whether the declared field type of a reference can be resolved (source or classpath); if not a warning will now be issued and the check will not be performed which makes the XDoclet usable in the case of OJB-61 (using the XJavadoc version 1.5)

msg: add tests to demonstrate handling with circular 1:n references
